About Me

Hi there! I’m Jan – a retro enthusiast who loves blending vintage vibes 🎮 with modern tech 🚀. Here, you'll find musings on old-school aesthetics, creative coding, and everything in between.

When I'm not tinkering with retro hardware or indulging in arcade classics 🕹️, I’m exploring new ways to bring that nostalgic spark ✨ to today's digital realm. Feel free to reach out or follow me on social media to share your favorite throwback games or geek out about the latest innovations.

Thanks for stopping by! Enjoy the trip down memory lane 🏁 and let's celebrate the magic of retro together.
